name: amazon-gamelift-testing-toolkit
description: A tool for deploying, testing and visualising Amazon GameLift
author: aws-solution-builders

scripts.deploy-toolkit: cd ManagementConsole/Infra && npx cdk synth && npx cdk -a cdk.out/assembly-AGTT-ManagementConsoleStack deploy --all
scripts.deploy-sample-game: yarn pack-sample-game && cd SampleGame/Infra && npx cdk synth && npx cdk -a cdk.out/assembly-AGTT-SampleGameStack deploy --all
scripts.delete-sample-game: cd SampleGame/Infra && npx cdk -a cdk.out/assembly-AGTT-SampleGameStack destroy --all
scripts.build-web: yarn install-web && yarn install-static && cd ManagementConsole/UI && yarn build
